N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.7 - Trucks and buses required to keep right; maintain distance

State Regulations
(a) When one or o1e
lanes and booths are open at the plaza, trucks and buses shall use the lane and
booth that is open at the extreme farthest point on the right-hand side, unless
instructed otherwise by a customs or immigration employee. For the purposes of
this section, the right-hand side shall be as the vehicle is approaching the
plaza. The height limitation under the canopy to the customs traffic lanes is
12 feet. (b) All commercial trucks
and buses shall maintain a distance of 1,000 feet between other like vehicles
traveling in the same direction while on the bridge. Notes
